DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of acute and repeat dosing of Systane Balance on Video Ocular Protection Index (OPI) and Blink Patterns in a population of dry eye patients.
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label, Single-Center Study Evaluating the Effect of Systane Balance on Video Ocular Protection Index (OPI) and Blink Patterns in Patients Diagnosed With Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: Patients must have history of mildmoderate dry eye with use of (or desire to use) eye drops in past 6 months Patients cannot wear contact lenses within 1 week prior nor during the study, and cannot have a history of hypersensitivity to any component of Systane Balance.
